statements: UPDATE CourseInformation SET course_description = 'New Description', instructor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE CourseInformation SET course_name = 'Updated Course', schedule = 'Friday 10:00AM', instructor_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE course_id = 102;
UPDATE CourseInformation SET course_name='Mathematics', instructor_name='John Doe' WHERE course_id=101;
UPDATE CourseInformation SET schedule='Mon, Wed, Fri', course_description='Advanced Calculus' WHERE course_id=105;
UPDATE course_info SET schedule='Mon-Wed-Fri 9-11AM' WHERE id=1
UPDATE instructor SET bio='Experienced instructor with over 10 years of teaching experience' WHERE instructor_id=5
UPDATE course_info SET course_name='Advanced Mathematics', schedule='Mon-Wed-Fri 10:00 AM', instructor_name='Dr. Smith' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE instructor SET bio='Experienced educator with a PhD in Mathematics' WHERE instructor_name='Dr. Smith';
UPDATE course_info SET course_name = 'Mathematics 101', course_description = 'Intro to Algebra' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE course_schedule SET instructor_id = 101, schedule_date = '2022-09-15', start_time = '09:00:00', end_time = '11:00:00' WHERE schedule_id = 5;
UPDATE course_info SET course_name = 'Advanced Programming', course_description = 'This course covers advanced topics in programming' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE course_schedule SET instructor_id = 3, schedule_date = '2023-06-15', start_time = '10:00:00', end_time = '14:00:00' WHERE course_id = 2 AND schedule_id = 5;
UPDATE Course SET course_name = 'Advanced Math', course_description = 'A challenging course for advanced students' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE Instructor SET department = 'Engineering' WHERE instructor_id = 2;
UPDATE Course SET course_description = 'New Course Description' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE Instructor SET department = 'New Department' WHERE instructor_id = 2;
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Mathematics 101', instructor_id = 2 WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE instructors SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE instructor_id = 3;
UPDATE courses SET course_name='Advanced Mathematics', course_description='This course covers advanced topics in mathematics.', course_schedule='Monday to Friday', instructor_id=3 WHERE course_id=1;
UPDATE instructors SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE instructor_id=2;
